author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:
This is the VID & Nano adaptions PR to take advantage of the 10_6 e/gamma dataformats now backported to 10_6. It also adds HEEP V7.1

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26486
title: Adapting VID & Nano to the new E/gamma UL format + adding HEEP V7.1: 106X
